post.body: Lol, what a shame. Surely...never mind, I'm sure there will be people ALL THE TIME. :B Not that I'm suggesting anything.
Ha, I think I expected something like that. I can download it for you if you want. :3
I wouldn't doubt that. That's sorta the sad part too. Let's hope nothing weird happens on Sat.
Also no way I'm cosplaying that. Or just in general.
Lol, you posted something. :3 Look at this wallpaper! :B http://snurl.com/9aby8
You might like this wallpaper. :P http://snurl.com/9a5cb
Mmm. Maybe. Friends since like...errr...long time counts I guess. -shrug-
BLAH. I'm bored and messaging you from about ten feet away.
"Surveys" are quite annoying, but I know for Firefox at least there's a neat plugin that blocks 'em.
Get a Twitter desktop client and you can post right from your desktop! Minimal work. Try twirl. Link in "from twirl."
Oh, and by the way. You should get Twitterrific for the iPod. It's so much cooler than just using mobile web.
Supposedly. Hopefully sleep comes for you.
._. Anyone able to read the text on this wallpaper? http://snurl.com/9a62q
Sleep, please come. :3
Missing someone... Where are you?
Ugh...school comes back in like a week...so little time left.
Wooh. Party was somewhat awesome. Ok, maybe more than somewhat. Made up for last night though
Ehh, found something, but what it found is basically fail and chkdsk doesn't like it. Copying from backup.
Almost doneee~! 90% and 19 minutes...
75%. So Apple Time Machine doesn't seem to be as good as it seems. :P
